thread.title: Art exhibit captures Dutch society in changing times
thread.title_full: Video: Art exhibit captures Dutch society in changing times | Watch PBS NewsHour Online | PBS Video

author: pbs.org
title: Art exhibit captures Dutch society in changing times
text: A new art exhibit is being heralded as the first show ever to look at the Dutch masterworks for how the painters viewed society. The exhibit, â€œClass Distinctions: Dutch Painting in the Age of Rembrandt and Vermeer," recently opened at the Museum of Fine Arts in Boston. WGBH's Jared Bowen reports.
